item.description:
Features

  • Added last break indicator: You can now see when your last break was taken, both in notifications and the menu bar

Improvements

  • Enhanced meeting detection settings: Camera and microphone detection can now be configured independently for more precise control

Bugfix

  • Fixed website analytics not properly tracking user events
  • Resolved license key input issues caused by line breaks
  • Fixed rare crash on the statistics screen related to data storage
